title: Hong Kong families despair as COVID rules may separate them from children
description: Guada, a mother of two young children and pregnant with twins, cries herself to sleep at night, worried that Hong Kong's severe COVID-19 rules will separate her from her kids or force her to give birth alone.
content: HONG KONG, Feb 25 (Reuters) - Guada, a mother of two young children and pregnant with twins, cries herself to sleep at night, worried that Hong Kong's severe COVID-19 rules will separate her from herâ€¦ [+3495 chars]
